DataDetectPolicySnapshot.name: DataDetectPolicySnapshot
DataDetectPolicySnapshot.description: Represents the snapshot of a DataDetect scan policy and its components retrieved during a job session.

DataDetectPolicyId.description: ID of the scan policy associated with the scan policy snapshot. This field is a relationship field.

Name.description: Name of the scan policy snapshot.

OwnerId.description: ID of the record owner. This field is a polymorphic relationship field.

RevisionNumber.description: Revision number of the scan policy snapshot associated with the scan policy.

SerializedPolicy.description: Sensitive data category item associated with the scan policy.
